sentences.sContent: There was a brief silence before anyone answered.
sentences.sCn: 沉默了片刻才有人回答。
“法庭上请保持肃静！”法官吼道。

sentences.sContent: The accused exercised his right to silence (= the legal right to choose to say nothing ) .
She held up her hand to silence the children.
sentences.sCn: 她抬手示意孩子们安静下来。

sentences.sContent: ...Suffering in silence Despite a law designed to protect them...

synos.tran: 沉默；寂静；缄默；不谈；无声状态
使沉默；使安静；压制；消除噪音

phrases.pCn: 静默无声；死一般的沉寂

words.tran: 沉默的；寂静的；无记载的
使沉默（silence的过去分词形式）；使安静

trans.tranOther: complete quiet because nobody is talking
to make someone stop talking, or stop something making a noise
